pt: {sc}shrewd{/sc} {sc}sagacious{/sc} {sc}perspicacious{/sc} {sc}astute{/sc} mean acute in perception and sound in judgment. {sc}shrewd{/sc} stresses practical, hardheaded cleverness and judgment.

pt.t: {it}sagacious{/it} investors got in on the ground floor

pt: {sc}perspicacious{/sc} implies unusual power to see through and understand what is puzzling or hidden.

pt.t: a {it}perspicacious{/it} counselor saw through the child's facade

pt: {sc}astute{/sc} suggests shrewdness, perspicacity, and diplomatic skill.

shortdef: of acute mental vision or discernment : keen
